item.title: Tips for convert a LiveUSB into a 'normal' boot
item.description: I just want a LiveUSB without the Live mode. Let's go! Create a LiveUSB with persistence file from the Startup Disk Creator. Skip boot menu: Copy the 5 first lines from /syslinux/txt.cfg to syslinux/syslinux.cfg (in my case with lubuntu 12.04): default live label live menu label ^Try Lubuntu without installing kernel /casper/vmlinuz append noprompt cdrom-detect/try-usb=true persistent file=/cdrom/preseed/lubuntu.seed boot=casper initrd=/casper/initrd.lz quiet splash -- Boot your LiveUSB. Disable autologin in /etc/lightdm/lightdm.
